radiographic_examinations.findings: Negative delta wave in inferior leads, positive delta wave in precordial leads V1 to V5, QT prolongation (QTm 600 ms, QTc 577 ms)
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: QT prolongation in ECG after ablation (QTm 640 ms, QTc 604 ms) but no delta wave visible

radiographic_examinations.findings: Polymorphic ventricular tachycardia (torsade de pointes) lasting 50 seconds, self-terminating
